title: ICE: translating unsupported cast: *mut [u32] (cast_other) -> *mut c_void (cast_pointer)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
error: internal compiler error: translating unsupported cast: *mut [u32] (cast_other) -> *mut libc::types::common::c95::c_void (cast_pointer)
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

Could not compile `handmade_libsdl`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```

This is done when compiling [this](https://github.com/GBGamer/handmade_hero_nostd) repository. Use `cargo build` on either the entire handmade_hero crate, or handmade_libsdl. Warning: Ugly, `no_std` code ahead!

Cleaned up repo: [newrepo](https://github.com/GBGamer/compiler_error)

It does need to be across crate lines, and needs to be returned in a result, afaict.

`rustc 1.0.0-nightly (91bdf23f5 2015-03-09) (built 2015-03-09)`
